# The `MaybeAlign` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This struct is a compact representation of a valid (power of two) or undefined (0) alignment. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::MaybeAlign</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This struct is a compact representation of a valid (power of two) or undefined (0) alignment.
